citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on
8/28/2024.
The APHIS inspector arrived at 11 AM on 8/28/24 to conduct an inspection. The inspector spoke with someone on-site
and learned that both of the individuals authorized for an AWA inspection were not on the premises today and were
unavailable. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility
representative available. Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and
Standards.
This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section
